name: Karlton Fender Flares (For Sale Here!!!!)
description:
*****Please contact us before ordering if you require shipping out of the usa***** midweststance@gmail.com
________________________________________________
Don't be fooled on the internet and buy FAKE Karlton flares. These are LEGIT! They will fit perfect, each set is made by hand. We don't use old molds like most companies. You might find these around for cheaper, but the fitment will be crap. We are the original Karlton Fender Flare dealer. 
________________________________________________
Are you looking into going with a wider setup? Or a more beefy tire?

This is the perfect application!
You will be able to run 18x10/18x11 with ease.
We do highly suggest you run at least 10.5 +15
A customer of ours is even running a 315 tire on 18x11's. These flares are definitely needed if you plan on stepping your game up.

- We offer these in Fiberglass and Carbon Fiber. These are custom made by order.
- Expect 1-2 weeks for delivery. 
- Fiberglass $750.00 
- Carbon Fiber $1,050.00

*****Please contact us before ordering if you require shipping out of the usa***** midweststance@gmail.com
NO REFUNDS!!!!
